description: OPINION AND ORDER re: 64 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Total Gas & Power North America, Inc., 85 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Total S.A., Total Gas & Power Limited. The Court has considered all of the arguments of the parties. To the extent not specifically addressed above, they are either moot or without merit. For the foregoing reasons, the defendants motions to dismiss, ECF Nos. 64 and 85, are granted. The clerk is directed to enter judgment dismissing this action and closing the case. The Clerk is also directed to close all pending motions. (Signed by Judge John G. Koeltl on 3/25/2017) (ras) (Entered: 03/27/2017)
